text: Leytron is a municipality of the district of Martigny in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. ==Villages== Leytron, Ovronnaz, Les Moulins, Produit, Montagnon, Les Places, Le Four, Dugny, Morthey and Lui Teise. ==Gallery== File:Leytron.jpeg|Leytron File:Ovronnaz.jpg|Ovronnaz ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Municipalities in Martigny
title: Leytron
